abstracts.cdata!:
The Study of the Plain of Antananarivo
            Technical Assistance Project components are: (a)
            pre-investment studies to define an integrated flood control
            and development program for the Antananarivo area, involving
            some 196 man-months of consultants' services including
            80 man-months for local consultants, at an average cost per
            man-month of $US5,500 at 1980 prices; average foreign
            exchange cost per man-month for expatriate experts will be
            US$2,000 per man-month for local subsistence. (b)
            Improvement of the network of research stations for erosion
            and spoil protection on the upper catchment areas of the
            Plain of Antananarivo; improvement of the hydrological and
            flood alarm network in the Plain. (c) Strengthening the
            capability of the Directorate General of Planning of the
            Ministry of Finance and Planning to supervise the program of
            studies and action for the Plain. The project will enable
            the Government to address the critical and long-standing
            issue of flood control in the Plain of Antananarivo area,
            and to establish an appropriate long-term development
            program for the region.
